archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1470
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a credit manager, I want to offer IFP to customers who got declined from an IFP application but then had positive plan only repayment history for X months, so that I can give them IFP for being a good paying customer.

properties.value: Is it free choice of Credit Manager to offer IFP, or should it be protected by rules configured in system? What are the criteria that overrides declined IFP application?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
